text_block_list.text: It had been a while since I had become Copano Rickey's trainer. Today, Copano Rickey was staring directly at my face.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Trainer, are you feeling kind of tired?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Your face seems a little pale, and I'll bet your head is feeling kind of heavy, right? For a while now, you've been leaning forward and holding your head.
I didn't realize it but……now that she mentions it, my head was starting to hurt, and it felt like things were getting a little hazy.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: So, it seems like you don't know? Hmmmm, if it's unconsciously……then maybe it's something physical like your 『Dwelling』.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with the trainers' room…… that means the cause is probably in the dorm!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Alright! Well, there's no time like the present! It's time for Rickey's surprise Feng Shui check! Let's go!
And with that, since I had no reason to stop her, the surprise Feng Shui check started.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……Hmmm, hmm, hmm, I see……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Aha, like I thought, there really is an issue! Seems like it's mostly around the bed. Ah, but I don't mean it's dirty though! It's perfectly clean☆

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It's just, in regards to Feng Shui, there's a bunch of places here and there that could be rearranged to increase luck!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: To be more specific, using that towel as a pillow cover. I understand that it's convenient, but it can decrease one's own luck in regards to business.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And the curtains and bed covers both having patterns isn't that good either. When the sunlight is strong, the pattern might ruin the balance.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Are those your pajamas? You're probably using old clothes for that, aren't you? I know it's economical, but in regards to Feng Shui, it would probably be better to buy some proper pajamas.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: There's a bunch of other things too but…… for now, how about we start with all that!?
After that, following Copano Rickey's instructions, I moved a few things around and replaced some old stuff―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Alright……we're all finished!
Before I realized it, this place now had a rather tranquil feel to it……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! I get it, you can't really put it in to words, but it feels like something changed. Passively increasing that power, that's one of Feng Shui's specialties♪

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: If you can keep the room like this, then you'll definitely be Rickey☆ Lucky☆ and Happy like me!
And then, several days later―
Before I realized it, my head had cleared up and I felt full of energy. Maybe it was due to my physical condition, but I was feeling much more positive too.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Really!? I'm glad! Truth is, a little while ago, I went to check on the 『Horizontal Pressure』 in Trainer's room!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ah, the 『Horizontal Pressure』 is something that weighs down on your heart unconsciously while you're sleeping.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: For example, if you have lots of patterned cloth, it can unintentionally scatter your focus, and having a proper pillow cover instead of that towel can help you sleep soundly.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Just like this, little by little, by fixing the small imperfections, you'll be able to sleep well, and your fortunes will improve!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: This is Feng Shui's power to bring good luck, in other words 『The Science of Environmental Fortune』!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: By changing your environment, it'll change the way you think, and by doing that it can even change your personality and disposition.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: That's why, if you want to become happy, you should start with your environment! ……but well, let's leave the explanation at that―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: How do you feel right now? Your thoughts are clear and bright! And feeling the energy welling up from within, that kind of feeling?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: You definitely want to put this experience in to words and tell everyone right!? Right, right, isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And so, we should strike while the iron's hot! Now, for Feng Shui publicity, let's go☆
After that, with Copano Rickey dragging me around, we spent all day spreading the good word around the school grounds.
